Articles.Content: I thought It might be cool if during the night in the planets that have an atmosphere, like Laythe, Eve, or Kerbin, there could be random meteors streaking across the sky. By random I mean like a few every minute; this is KSP we're talking about.
Generally accepted as a good idea, but is on the WNTS list.
He means as an asthetic feature.Good suggestion I'd spend even longer looking at the enviroments.
Yeah, I'm not talking about asteroids that plow into the surface of planets. Just an aesthetic feature.
